document_data.name: Planar Church of the Seven Heavens
document_data.mainbody: The '''Planar Church of the Seven Heavens''' was a temple in the city of [[Bral]], the sole city on the surface of the [[Rock of Bral]], dedicated to the [[Planar Church of the Seven Heavens|planar church of the same name]].
document_data.Location: This temple was located in the [[Bral/Temple District|Temple District]] of the [[Middle City]] of Bral, across the road from the [[Planar Church of Olympus (Bral)|Planar Church of Olympus]].
document_data.History: This temple was established sometime in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], being a newcomer among the faiths of Bral.
